author: Steve Dent
title: Now is the time to grab a cheap Google-powered smart display
description: Google-powered smart displays can be handy during the COVID-19 lockdown for not only music and information chores, but letting you communicate with loved ones. As it happens, a couple of the models are on sale today, including Google’s Nest Hub Smart Assistan…
